name: Stumbling upon meaning in an old town abandoned to its fate
name_original: Stumbling upon meaning in an old town abandoned to its fate
description:
We recommend playing full screen.

A browser exploration game about an old city, where you can find the meaning of the words in the streets and unlock the secrets of those who lived there.

Photos are from public domain taken from the new york public library
